I often find that as I am preparing to develop an approach for a specific community, I am without anyone who I can have frank and open conversations with about concerns or obstacles. Propriety, attribution, credit, and ego frequently halt conversation before it goes anywhere at all. We need an organization to have intelligent conversation with about these topics and it must be without agenda. No organization currently out there allows for this level of conversation. Everyone seems to have an agenda or an organization they are pushing. If we can address this now, than innovation can continue. Otherwise, silo after silo after silo...everyone with the "right " answer.
Discussing concepts, implementation and approaches with a relevant expert
